com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fsm

Class StackStateMachine<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fsm.DefaultStateMachine<E>
      • com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fsm.StackStateMachine<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - is the type of the entity handled by this state machine.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    StateMachine<E>, Telegraph

    public class StackStateMachine<E>
extends DefaultStateMachine<E>
    A StateMachine implementation that keeps track of all previous States via a stack. This makes sense for example in case of a hierarchical menu structure where each menu screen is one state and one wants to navigate back to the main menu anytime, via revertToPreviousState().

    • Field Summary

      • revertToPreviousState

        public boolean revertToPreviousState()
        Change state back to the previous state. That is the high-most state on the internal stack of previous states.
        Specified by:
        revertToPreviousState in interface StateMachine<E>
        Overrides:
        revertToPreviousState in class DefaultStateMachine<E>
        Returns:
        True in case there was a previous state that we were able to revert to. In case there is no previous state, no state change occurs and false will be returned.
